segments.text: I'm taking in this kitchen scene, and it feels almost surreal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are so many distinct problems happening simultaneously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with water, creating a mini-flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, completely focused on their illicit cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised by the sheer number of impending disasters in one small room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is definitely going to fall from that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman is oblivious, standing knee-deep in water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calmly she continues her dish-drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of all that wasted, dirty water makes me feel quite disgusted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s like a meticulously staged tableau of domestic chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wonder which of these unfortunate events will unfold first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of simultaneous unawareness is truly remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR
